Name: name
Text: Gina

Name: d_place
Text: Earth

Name: d_tokki
Text: Serious and brave. Somewhat fastidious.

Name: d_tokki
Text: Mother discarded own body, was "cyberized".

Name: d_tokki
Text: Bad at lying. Hates deceiving people.

Name: d_tokki
Text: Very intuitive, but not aware of this herself.

Name: d_tokki
Text: Profession: Space traffic controller.

Name: d_tokki
Text: Likes Japanese food.

Name: d_tokki
Text: Three Sizes: 7

Name: t_aisatu
Text: {0}. Hello.

Name: t_suspect
Text: I think I'd like {0} to go to sleep...

Name: t_suspect
Text: {0}... You talk too much.

Name: t_suspect
Text:
No.
I can't trust {0} as everyone else does.

Name: t_suspect
Text:
I can't trust {0},
staying so silent like that.

Name: t_suspect
Text:
Thinking stochastically...
I think we should doubt {0}.

Name: t_suspect
Text: I can't trust {0}.

Name: t_suspect
Text:
I'm sorry, {0}.
I just... Can't trust you anymore.

Name: t_suspect
Text:
I can't trust {0}.
Neither could {1}, before disappearing...

Name: t_suspect_r
Text:
I want to believe... but I just can't.
I think {0} should sleep.

Name: t_suspect_r
Text:
{0}... Are you nervous?
You've been talking too much.

Name: t_suspect_r
Text:
I, too, trusted {0}. But...
I feel that was a mistake.

Name: t_suspect_r
Text:
{0}...
Don't you want to say anything?

Name: t_suspect_r
Text:
I want to trust {0}, but...
Probabilistically, something is suspicious.

Name: t_suspect_r
Text:
I retract my previous statement.
I just can't trust {0}.

Name: t_suspect_add
Text:
I'm sorry if I'm mistaken.
But... I feel {0} looks suspicious.

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text:
Me, too...
I want {0} to sleep.

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text: {0} seems to be... nervous.

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text: I agree. {0} can't be trusted.

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text: Yes... {0}'s attitude seems unnatural.

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text:
By my calculations...
It's natural to doubt {0}.

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text: {0}... Yes, {0}. Something certainly feels strange.

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text:
{0} is lying.
I can tell.

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text:
{0} should sleep.
I think... that's what I want.

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text:
{0}, what is your goal?
It's not the same as mine...

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text:
Suspicious? {0}?
Yes... That makes sense.

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text: Why are you so quiet, {0}...?

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text: I... can't deny that.

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text:
{0} does indeed seem...
Somehow suspicious...

Name: t_suspected0
Text: Apparently I seem suspicious.

Name: t_suspected0
Text:
Do you hate me?
I see...

Name: t_hanron0
Text: I want to believe {0}.

Name: t_hanron0
Text:
Personally...
I want to trust {0} over {1}.

Name: t_hanron1
Text:
{0} seems suspicious, but...
I have no reason to go that far.

Name: t_hanron_t0
Text: I agree. I don't feel there's any reason to doubt {0}.

Name: t_hanron_t1
Text: I, too, want to trust {0}...

Name: t_trust
Text: This ship... needs {0}.

Name: t_trust
Text: Thinking stochastically... I feel we can trust {0}.

Name: t_trust
Text:
{0}...
I trust you.

Name: t_trust_r
Text:
{0} is suspicious. But...
I don't want {0} to sleep.

Name: t_trust_r
Text:
Stochastically speaking, we should trust {0}.
Regardless of suspicion.

Name: t_trust_r
Text:
I'm sorry, {0}. I had doubted you.
I'll trust you from now on.

Name: t_trust_t0
Text: I, too, think we can trust {0}.

Name: t_trust_t1
Text:
Alright...
I'll trust {0}.

Name: t_thanron0
Text: I disagree. I can't trust {0}.

Name: t_thanron1
Text:
That's not right.
There's something strange about {1} defending {0}.

Name: t_thanron_t0
Text: I agree. It's dangerous to trust {0}.

Name: t_thanron_t1
Text:
I, too, disagree...
{0} can't be trusted as much as {1} claims.

Name: t_hosho
Text:
It's obvious that {0} is definitely {1}.
Any objections?

Name: t_hosho
Text: {0} is human. I think we can agree on this.

Name: t_hosho_enemy
Text:
{0} is lying.
There's no way you're {1}.

Name: t_hosho_enemy
Text: {0} is... {1}. They have to be.

Name: t_hosho_enemy
Text:
{0} is {1}.
Any way you look at it. Human, but an enemy to humans.

Name: t_hosho_enemy
Text:
{0}... What are you?
You're not human, nor Gnosia.
Some sort of unthinkable... {1}?

Name: t_hosho_enemy
Text: Something about {0} is wrong.

Name: t_hosho_enemy
Text:
{0} is not Gnosia. This is a fact.
But {0} is lying. This is also a fact.

Name: t_hosho_miss
Text:
{0}... That's wrong.
That is not certain.

Name: t_hosho_miss
Text:
{0}...
That's something we all know.

Name: t_hosho_get
Text:
Yes.
As {0} says, I'm {1}.

Name: t_hosho_get
Text:
Yes...
You're... right.

Name: t_tohyo_go
Text: If nobody has anything to say, I think we should vote...

Name: t_tohyo_mae
Text: It's about time to decide on who will sleep.

Name: t_tohyo_sai
Text: We have to choose who will sleep between {0}...

Name: t_shokei
Text:
Good night...
I'll dream of you all.

Name: t_shokei
Text:
I have no right to say this, but...
I'm sorry for lying...

Name: t_wakare
Text:
{0}... Sleep well.
We'll meet again, I'm sure.

Name: t_karare
Text:
I understand. I...
You're {0}. I was human.

Name: t_imjinro
Text:
Aha, ahaha... Yes... That's right!
I was {0}!

Name: t_shori
Text:
So now, this place is...
Free of {0}.

Name: t_tohyo_kurikaeshi
Text: This will all just... repeat again.

Name: t_tohyo_jeno
Text: {0}... I think they should all go to sleep.

Name: t_tohyo_alive
Text: If a decision can't be reached, we should do nothing.

Name: t_tohyo_jeno_ok
Text: I agree. I think everyone should sleep.

Name: t_tohyo_jeno_ng
Text: I disagree... I still don't know what is what.

Name: t_tohyo_alive_ok
Text: I, too, think we should do nothing.

Name: t_tohyo_alive_ng
Text: I... don't want to do that. I disagree.

Name: t_tohyo_jeno_kettei
Text:
So... it's settled.
{0}... Sleep well. Sweet dreams.

Name: t_tohyo_alive_kettei
Text:
The majority agrees... Tonight, we'll do nothing.
I'm sure things will change tomorrow.

Name: t_tohyo_hitei
Text: So most of us disagree... I see.

Name: t_tohyo_dame
Text:
Time is up...
I'll see you tomorrow... hopefully.

Name: t_co
Text: dammy

Name: t_co
Text:
I'm the {0}. I can investigate one person overnight.
I can tell whether they're Gnosia or not.

Name: t_co
Text:
If anyone goes into cold sleep, let me examine them...
I'm the {0}, so I can detect Gnosia.

Name: t_co
Text: I'm the {0}.

Name: t_co
Text:
I didn't leave the ship at the previous station.
So... I'm human.

Name: t_co
Text: dammy

Name: t_co
Text: dammy

Name: t_co
Text: dammy

Name: t_co
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_find
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_find
Text:
I'm the {0}. My investigation has made it clear...
{1} is Gnosia.

Name: t_co_find
Text:
I examined those sleeping. I'm the {0}.
{1}... was Gnosia.

Name: t_co_find
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_find
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_find
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_find
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_find
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_find
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_taiko
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_taiko
Text:
No... the {0} is me.
I'm supposed to be the only one with access to the dimensional control core.

Name: t_co_taiko
Text: That's a lie... The only {0} on this ship is me.

Name: t_co_taiko
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_taiko
Text:
I can confirm that {1} remained here on the ship.
I was here, too.

Name: t_co_taiko
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_taiko
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_taiko
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_taiko
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_req
Text:
Who is the {0} here?
Please, come forward.

Name: t_co_after
Text:
{1}...
One of them is lying...

Name: t_co_after
Text:
{1}...
Only one of them is the true {0}...

Name: t_uranai_o
Text: Regarding the attack,

Name: t_uranai_s
Text: Here's my report.

Name: t_uranai_b
Text: I investigated someone else.

Name: t_uranai_t
Text: I investigated {1}. {1} is {0}.

Name: t_uranai_f
Text:
I investigated {1}, and the result was "human".
Not {0}.

Name: t_uranai_n
Text: There's nobody left I want to investigate...

Name: t_reibai_s
Text: I have a report. I examined the cold sleeper yesterday.

Name: t_reibai_f
Text: Results turned out negative for {0}. {1} {3} human.

Name: t_reibai_ff
Text:
{1}, both human.
Just what are we doing...?

Name: t_houkoku_s
Text: My report is the same.

Name: t_houkoku_w
Text: That's not right...

Name: t_okuyami
Text:
{0}. {0}... {0}.
I won't forget you.

Name: t_okuyami_n
Text: I'm glad to be able to see everyone again today...

Name: t_houkoku_req
Text: Who else has a report to give?

Name: t_houkoku_not
Text: Can you... not report? {0}...

Name: t_skill_sayNingen
Text:
State that you are human...
In front of everyone, one at a time. Swear it.
If you do, then I can trust you.

Name: t_skill_sayNingen
Text: Yes, I'm... human.

Name: t_skill_sayNingen
Text:
Why would you do that...?
I'm against it.

Name: t_skill_sayNingen
Text: So... no one is going to engage, I see.

Name: t_skill_sayNingen
Text:
Thank you...
Those of you who swore just now...
I trust you.

Name: t_skill_sayNingen
Text:
Thank you, everyone...
But... there's one here among you.
Gnosia.

Name: t_skill_sayNingen
Text:
{0}...
Why do you try to stop this?
Are you...?

Name: t_skill_zatsudan
Text:
Dumplings...?!
Just now... Did someone say something about dumplings?

Name: t_skill_zatsudan
Text:
Love... love.
I... don't have anything to talk about...

Name: t_skill_zatsudan
Text:
A scary story...
I'm afraid of... being alone, I guess.

Name: t_skill_zatsudan
Text:
{0}.
We can talk about things like that later.

Name: t_skill_roller
Text:
Alright...
I'll vote for all those who claimed to be the {0}.

Name: t_skill_roller
Text:
I... don't agree.
Sacrificing someone should be our last resort.

Name: t_skill_roller
Text: I'm with {2}. I, too, disagree.

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text:
What are you saying...?
No one reported anything like that.

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text:
Alright. I'll vote for {0}.
Since I have no reason not to...

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text:
Will you learn anything from putting me into cold sleep?
If so, then do so.

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text:
I... don't agree.
I don't think we should do this.

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text:
Thank you, {2}.
I... don't want to vote against {0}, either.

Name: t_skill_dontTohyo
Text:
I think... {0} is lying.
But for the moment, we should put off cold sleep.
We should vote for someone else.

Name: t_skill_dontTohyo
Text:
Yes...
I agree.

Name: t_skill_dontTohyo
Text:
If someone wants to vote for {0}...
I don't think we should stop them.

Name: t_skill_dontTohyo
Text:
I agree.
There's no reason to stop anyone.

Name: t_skill_kyoryoku
Text:
Alright...
I'll trust you, {0}.
From here on out.

Name: t_skill_kyoryoku
Text: I'd... rather not.

Name: t_skill_h_help
Text: Sorry...

Name: t_skill_h_careful
Text:
{0} is lying...
I'm sure you'll all realize it, eventually...

Name: t_skill_dogeza
Text:
Stop it.
{0}... I don't want to see you like this...

Name: t_personal
Text:
{0}...
I... Let's stop this.

Name: t_personal
Text:
So you've been lying...
{0}...

Name: t_personal
Text:
Coming here was pointless.
I have nothing to say to you.

Name: t_personal
Text:
{0}, you and I are both human.
I'm... glad to know that.

Name: t_personal
Text:
{0}, you're human.
I'm...

Name: t_personal
Text:
{0}... I feel safer with you around.
I feel like everything is OK.

Name: t_personal
Text:
{0}...
I wish I could... trust you...

Name: t_personal
Text: {0}, I... still just don't know about you.

Name: t_personal
Text: I... I can't trust you, {0}.

Name: t_personal
Text:
{0}... Are you OK with this?
Are you really OK with what you're doing...?

Name: t_personal
Text:
I really hope...
That we can get off this ship together.

Name: t_personal
Text:
{0} was...
The exit from which all the hit songs flow.

Name: t_personal
Text: {0}... You tried your best.

Name: t_personal
Text: I really hope that... you and I are both human.

Name: t_personal
Text:
{0}, you and I... One of us is going to go away.
I can feel it.

Name: t_personal
Text: What...?

Name: t_personal
Text:
Someone among us is not human.
I don't want to believe it, but... apparently it's true.

Name: t_personal
Text:
{0}...
Have you noticed, {0}?

Name: t_personal
Text:
{1} is lying.
So... {1} is not human, I'm sure of it.

Name: t_personal
Text:
I've been lying...
{1} may know as well.

Name: t_personal
Text:
So, if I disappear...
Remember what I said.

Name: t_personal
Text:
{0}...
So, you trusted me...

Name: t_personal
Text:
Thank you, {0}.
I won't forget it.

Name: t_personal
Text:
So tonight... we're going to get rid of someone.
I understand.

Name: t_personal
Text:
As for whom we do away with, I've left it up to you.
I'm sorry.

Name: t_personal
Text:
If it was me...
I think I'd eliminate {1}.

Name: t_personal
Text: (The one I chose disappeared...)

Name: t_personal
Text:
({0}... Thank you.
 I didn't want you to hurt alone.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
I made it.
Together with you, {0}.

Name: t_personal
Text:
I...
I relied on you constantly, {0}.
It's OK, I know.

Name: t_personal
Text:
But I hope that, even just a little...
I was able to help you, too, {0}.

Name: t_personal
Text:
So...
The Gnosia is gone.

Name: t_personal
Text:
I was sure I would disappear.
So, I feel sort of... strange.

Name: t_personal
Text:
The Gnosia... is gone.
In that case...

Name: t_personal
Text:
{0}, I doubted you.
I was wrong, and I'm sorry.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Thank you.
I... won't forget it.

Name: t_personal
Text:
The Gnosia...
I wonder what will become of them now?

Name: t_personal
Text:
So... we survived.
You, {0}, and me.

Name: t_personal
Text:
It's strange...
I thought I'd be put into cold sleep.
I'm no good at lying.

Name: t_personal
Text:
All of it...
It's thanks to you, {0}.

Name: t_personal
Text:
We eliminate humans.
So... we had to be sure to survive.

Name: t_personal
Text:
But... it's strange.
{0}, I'm glad you made it.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Everyone else needs to be eliminated.
I'll do it... It's the least I can do.

Name: t_personal
Text:
{0}...
I'm glad you were here, {0}.

Name: t_personal
Text:
I didn't really want to...
make it to the end...

Name: t_personal
Text: Because I... well... Hehe.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Aha, ahaha! Yes!
I was Gnosia!

Name: t_personal
Text:
Yes...
This is the end.

Name: t_personal
Text:
In that case, I guess it's all over.
You, me, this entire universe.
Because, well... I'm a Bug.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Why...?
Why did things have to turn out like this?

Name: t_personal
Text:
Had you noticed, {0}?
That I was Gnosia?

Name: t_personal
Text: Yes...

Name: t_personal
Text:
It's thanks to you that I was able to survive.
So... Thank you, {0}.

Name: t_temp
Text:
Generally low ability levels, but strong and
serious personality, always sure to do what
she feels she has to do.

Name: t_temp
Text:
While not self-aware, she is highly intuitive,
quickly noticing situational discrepancies.
Self-sacrificing, helps find enemies.
